revised_title: Absorption Spectra of Iodine in Various Solvents
tldr: The author investigates the absorption spectra of iodine in various states, including solid, liquid, and solutions in different solvents. The study reveals that the absorption spectra vary depending on the state and solvent, with the blue end of the spectrum being cut off and absorption extending towards the less refrangible end as the thickness of the iodine layer increases.
